short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simpl.js lets you write and run full-stack javascript apps in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simpl.js comes with modules to set up HTTP servers, TCP socket servers and clients, databases, and more. Its integrated development environment supports versioning, manages dependencies and app configuration, and generates module documentation from source code.

You get everything without ever leaving the browser!
